title: Exquisite Kundan Jhumka with Pearl Center and Tassel Drop
materials: 22K Gold Plated Base. Features a central freshwater pearl
surrounded by high-quality Kundan settings with multicoloured gemstones including ruby
amethyst and cubic zirconia. Accented with delicate pink crystal tassel drop and a Hyderabadi polish for lasting brilliance.
features: Traditional Jhumka design with a modern twist. The floral motif surrounding the pearl is meticulously crafted using the age-old Kundan setting technique, where uncut gemstones are set in gold foil. The tassel drop adds a contemporary flair. This piece combines the timeless elegance of South Indian craftsmanship with a modern aesthetic.
colors: complemented by the varied hues of the multicoloured gemstones
creating a vibrant and eye-catching palette. The pink crystal tassel adds a playful touch.
occasions: and special occasions. Suitable for a traditional half-saree function or a modern cocktail party.
description: This Jhumka is a unique blend of traditional South Indian artistry and contemporary design. The Kundan setting and the pearl center reflect cultural heritage, while the tassel drop makes it a modern statement piece. It is handcrafted by skilled artisans, ensuring exceptional quality and durability. The variety of gemstones adds a vibrant sparkle and makes it a versatile accessory.
